title: Video Sharing functionality
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the filmroom

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 3 dots (bottom right corner)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is presented with share functionality

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Share this video'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN 'Share this video' popup is displayed
AND user can successfully copy and paste the url
